metadata.normative_data: Based on current evidence from validated EI assessments and large-scale studies

items.text: When faced with a challenging situation, how often do you accurately identify your own emotions?

options.text: Never experienced this in real-life situations (0)
Rarely experienced this in everyday contexts (1)
Sometimes encountered under stress or calm (2)
Often noticed in both personal and professional settings (3)
Nearly always apparent regardless of circumstances (4)

interpretation.recommendation: Your responses indicate challenges in emotional awareness and regulation. Consider interventions focused on emotional skills training.
Your emotional skills are average. Enhancing your emotional awareness and communication may further improve your relationships.
Your responses suggest strong emotional competencies. Continue to develop these skills and consider leadership roles that leverage your emotional insight.
